channel.title: Server Status
channel.description:
After changing my server to a new PC, the mopar server status checker is saying my server is offline.
rune-server says its online
runeloc says its online
people can get on the server aside from me.

item.title: Server Status
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

[quote=“Exstasy, post:2, topic:418882”][quote author=killemquick0 link=topic=521422.msg3788897#msg3788897 date=1319128775]
After changing my server to a new PC, the mopar server status checker is saying my server is offline.

rune-server says its online

runeloc says its online

people can get on the server aside from me.
[/quote]

hmm i’ve never had that happen to me, mopar must be looking at it from your old PC and be like hmm its offline… as long as people can connect i guess?[/quote]

Thats what I was thinking, but the only IP that has changed is the MAC address. The router still assigns the same number your ISP gives you, in which no-ip redirects.

rune-server asks you to verify the server from the hosted PC, maybe mopar should add this instead of having it automatic.

EDIT: nevermind, its working for some reason now. Guess it was just the server status checker lagging?

Read full topic
